post:
**Presenting a brand new web-hosting template - EpElegant, Designed by ElitePixels.net . **

![](http://i.imgur.com/8FLw4Aj.png)

Features:


Neat, Layered PSD files : http://i.imgur.com/qAXhVZY.png

Clean Coded HTML/CSS

Integrated with WHMCS

Has 5 Pages: Home/Shared/Dedi/VPS/Text Page

4 Different Versions to choose from : Blue/Red/Blue-Black/Red-Black color combinations.

VPS Page has a unique slider.

Dedicated Page with neat tables.

And many many more options!
